posts.post_content:
Another popular Old Judge Western Association team is Minneapolis. The following players are available: Turner, Vinton, Minnehan, Daly, Howes, Jantzen, Brosnan and West. There is also a Joe Miller, but that is a very scarce(and expensive) card. Images and prices are available by emailing me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]. Trades are always considered (and appreciated).

Thanks--Jay
